entry.tran: 兴高采烈的;得意洋洋的
entry.def: If you are cock-a-hoop, you are extremely pleased about something that you have done.

auth_sentence.content: Its because of the cockahoop attitude of people flouting a maverick theory that does not stand up to the first test in logic.
